name: Dungeons (Early)
description:
Dungeons
Move the hero around in this top-down setting to guide him to the exit. Mobile-Ready.

How To Click "Play": You Move The Player To The "Play" button

NOTE : Still In Development  There Will Be Many Bugs To Be Fixed... Click Here To E-mail Me to Fix Any Bugs, New Ideas Or Game Problems
